name: The Lineup (MarkMyWords)
description:
You are a police officer showing a group of suspects to a civilian that reported an incident when the lights mysteriously flicker. Oh no! Did the suspects move around while the lights were off? Use your memory to reorganize them to their original positions in the lineup.

  1. Study the lineup
  2. Click "Ready"
  3. Drag and drop the suspects to return them to their original positions
  4. Click "Submit" when you think you have them in their positions

To complete a level, you must click "Submit" once you believe you have the suspects in the original order they were shown to you. But you only have three attempts before your boss thinks you are unfit to do your job.

How long was your dev time?
~3.5 hours per Dev

Team:
Me - Dev, Music, Simple Art, Game Design

Zee - Dev, Code Architecture, Game Design

Assets used from outside of this Jam:

  • Kenney Character Assets
